productName: DCP-T220 Ink Tank Printer User-friendly and super low cost printer for home users
description:
A4 print speed up to 16 ipm (Black)/ 9 ipm (Colour)
USB 2.0
Intuitive Buttons, 64 MB Memory, 150 Sheets Paper Tray
Full ink bottles included. Yield up to 7500/5000 pages (black/colour)*
Compatible with Brother iPrint&Scan Desktop App** & BR Admin**
